annonsrubrik: Product Manager to a global company in Mölndal!
annonstext:
We are looking for a Product Manager within the marketing team to a global company in Mölndal!

Your responsibility
• Activate marketing and launch plans
• Manage the local A&P budget within area of responsibility and follow-up of marketing activities
• Product/service and article administration including tender positioning and development requests
• KAM support in tender shaping and optimization
• KAM support within pharma channel with quotation work
• Sales support in implementation of tenders, including product training, educational material and customer support material
• Activate communication plan towards key target groups within Health care are pharmacy channel and drive presence at relevant customer events and exhibitions

Qualifications

Required Education & Experience
• University degree within economics or marketing
• At least 3 years´ experience of a similar role, preferably within the MedTech industry
• High proficiency in English and Swedish
• Experience within Windows 365 and Google analytics is a plus

About you
The role involves interaction with a lot of different stake holders where your cooperative and communicative skills is important. We believe you are a flexible team player with a drive and an analytical mindset. We also hope that you are a service minded doer with lots of enthusiasm and energy, close to laughter and not afraid to speak you mind.

About the assignment
The consultant assignment will start as soon as possible and will continue until November 1, 2021 with a possibility of extension.

Welcome with your application!
